General.Name: Jinxi Axle Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinxi Axle Company Limited engages in the research, development, and manufacturing of railway vehicles and accessories, precision forging, and precision casting products in China. It offers railway freight cars, such as gondola, flat, tank, box, and funnel cars; railway axles for railway freight and passenger cars, as well as subway and EMU axles; shafts for light rail, locomotives, EMUs, bolster side frames, and other railway vehicle accessories; domestic and industrial sewage treatment equipment; environmental protection equipment; smart fire protection equipment; defense equipment; and casting products. The company also exports its products. Jinxi Axle Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is based in Taiyuan, China.
